statements: UPDATE error_correction_operations SET error_syndrome = '101010', correction_operation = 'X' WHERE qubit_state = 'Qubit1';
UPDATE error_correction_operations SET correction_operation = 'Y', error_syndrome = '010101' WHERE qubit_state = 'Qubit2';
UPDATE error_correction_operations SET correction_operation = 'X' WHERE qubit_state = '0000'
UPDATE error_correction_operations SET error_syndrome = '101010' WHERE qubit_state = '1111'
UPDATE error_syndromes SET syndrome_description = 'Syntax Error' WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
UPDATE error_corrections SET correction_operation = 'Fix Typo' WHERE syndrome_id = 2;
UPDATE error_syndromes SET syndrome_description='Migraine' WHERE syndrome_id=1;
UPDATE error_corrections SET correction_operation='Treatment updated' WHERE syndrome_id=2 AND correction_id=5;
UPDATE qubit_states SET qubit_state = '1' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE error_corrections SET description = 'Fixes bit flip error' WHERE error_correction_op = 'X' AND id = 1;
UPDATE qubit_states SET qubit_state = '1', error_syndrome = 'X' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE error_corrections SET description = 'Corrects X gate error' WHERE error_correction_op = 'X';
UPDATE error_syndromes SET syndrome_description = 'New description for syndrome 1' WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
UPDATE error_corrections SET correction_operation = 'New operation for correction 2' WHERE correction_id = 2;
UPDATE error_syndromes SET qubit_state = 'new_qubit_state' WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
UPDATE error_corrections SET correction_operation = 'new_correction_operation' WHERE correction_id = 2;
UPDATE error_syndromes SET syndrome_description = 'New Description' WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
UPDATE qubit_states SET state_description = 'Updated State' WHERE state_id = 3;
UPDATE error_syndromes SET syndrome_description = 'New Syndrome Description' WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
UPDATE syndrome_corrections SET correction_id = 3 WHERE syndrome_id = 2;
